Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Up to 5% cash rebate on all spend for spend above S$2,000/month per quarter
>Up to 3.33% cash rebate for spend between S$500 and S$1,999/month per quarter
Up to 20% additional SMART$ rebate with UOB SMART$ Rebate Programme
